sentences.sContent: You see this in the faces of tsunami and earthquake survivors on television.
sentences.sCn: 你能从电视上海啸和地震的生还者的脸上看到这点。

sentences.sContent: They urged other town residents unaffected by the quake and tsunami to do the same.
sentences.sCn: 他们敦促其他没有受到地震和海啸影响的城镇居民也这样做。

trans.tranOther: a very large wave, caused by extreme conditions such as an  earthquake  , which can cause a lot of damage when it reaches land
